Good morning my love

It is December. A wonderfull month of the year where we celebrate a lot of things. Starting with another year in Finland, followed with a birthday, skiing, cozy family holidays, and ending another anniversary.

So what is this?

Decemeber also has a tradition that you asked for...

...so here is your own digital December advent calendar

Enjoy

just open the days and each day has something new.

It is not finished yet but along the way more and more days will be added.

I love you my love
